DOC.detailed_description: Ajzen 's Theory Planned Behaviour theoretically underpin study . A qualitative descriptive design use purposive sample 20 Taiwanese pregnant woman previously CS live baby recruit Chang Gung Memorial Hospital Taiwan . In-depth interview carry three phase : ( 1 ) 34 week 38 week woman 's pregnancy ; ( 2 ) third day childbirth ; ( 3 ) fourth week birth , end confinement . Boyatzis ' Data Driven approach adopt thematically analyze data .
